name: Stuart Little 2
description:
Stuart Little 2 is an arcade game developed by Hyperspace Cowgirls. It came out on 01-07-2002. It was published by Infogrames. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Stuart Little 2 is available on Game Boy Color and PC.
Douglas Wick and Lucy Fisher produced the game. Rob Minkoff directed the game. Alan Silvestri scored the game.
